[actor as police chief] The JonBenet Ramsey case is a case like we have never seen before,
translation.ko: 존베넷 램지 사건 같은 범죄는 우리도 처음입니다

translation.en: a case like I don't think any of you have ever seen before.

translation.en: or have they been elevated to the status of suspects?
[police chief] No comment. No more questions.
[reporter] Was Patsy involved?

"It was precious.

translation.en: That was a gift."
"JonBenet was looking forward to the day she could wear real evening gowns,
just like her mother."
"Just like her mother."
It is so narcissistic. I'm just shocked.
I don't remember that. I read this book, and I don't remember it.
translation.ko: 이 책은 읽었는데 이 부분은 기억 안 나네요

translation.en: Wow.
She was no longer doing the beauty queen thing.

translation.en: or work at Hooters.
From what...
I heard and kind of put together...
it sounded like... that family was really screwed up.

I hope she didn't, but I think she might have.

Watching her...
